name: Cave Level (College Project)
description:
This is a small cave environment created in unity for a college assignment. It has 7 interconnected rooms that make up 3 different environments, one at the top with plants and natural sunlight, one at the middle with storage crates and resources, and one at the bottom with crystals and lava pools. It also has a first person character controller to explore the environment.

Controls

  • Move - WSAD
  • Jump - spacebar
  • Sprint - shift
  • Move Camera - mouse
  • Interact - E or F

To use the lifts in the tall hub area, use interact on the levers beside them

Resources Used

Textures from ambientCG

Low-Lying Plant Pack by Jonathan Foust

Exaggerated and Unique Foliage by Jonathan Foust

Purple Crystal Mine by Astire Games

Toon Crystals Pack by ClayManStudio

Fantasy Skybox FREE by Render Knight

Footsteps - Essentials by Nox_Sound

the code, general level design, and any models not listed above are my own
